creator: Frank.Niessen@adobe.com
text:
a connection to port 80 failed if if a WebdavFile object is created by one of
the constructors not using the HttpURL. The converting steps in the constuctor
chain is strippin the port out and replaced it by -1

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
This is obviously not an httpd server bug, the Apache server contains
  no WebdavFile nor HttpURL classes.

  PLEASE try the appropriate user support list, and review some other
  active bugs in this database for examples of how much information is
  required for a bug to be considered.  The two reports you filed this
  morning are certainly insufficient for any practical reproduction
  or debugging.
